snippet: Officials said clerks at a Valero gas station in Riverhead gave Marvin Choy Nij $774, later cashing his ticket for themselves.
abstract: Yalcin Nergiz, Yuniz Ozturk and Orhan Ozturk are arrested for cashing $74,892 winning lottery ticket belonging to Guatemalan immigrant Marvin Choy Nij; two of the men are clerks at gas station in Long Island, NY, where Nij came to claim his prize and was told it was only worth $774.
lead_paragraph: Officials said clerks at a Valero gas station in Riverhead gave Marvin Choy Nij $774, later cashing his ticket for themselves.

headline.seo: 3 Suffolk Clerks Accused of Stealing $75,000 Lottery Ticket
headline.main: Three Held in Theft of $75,000 Lottery Ticket
headline.print_headline: Three Held In Stealing Of Big Ticket
